channel.title: Write-ups on Miast.io
channel.description: Recent content in Write-ups on Miast.io

item.title: UofTCTF 2024 - Illusion
item.description: UofTCTF 2024 forensics/Illusion Writeup We’re given a PCAP file with a lot of traffic to and from one IP address. Looking into it, its mainly http traffic, with some calls to a cloned Google.com page, and a get request for an image. The requests to the images caught my interest, as they don’t return any image data, just a 200OK. The GUID string looks like base64, but doesn’t decode to anything.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: Hello World Hello! My name is Miasto, I’m a security researcher and PhD student based in Ireland. I’m currently researching Cyber Resilience vs Cybersecurity, and using Cyber Range technologies for pentesting and security assurance. I’ve previously done research on P2P Botnets and IoT malware, and different emerging threats. I try to keep on eye on developments in that space, it’s still something I’ve a keen interest in. I’m also an avid CTF player, both in jeporady and AD.
